title: Black Screen in store for the past 4-5 days (PLEASE READ)
body:
So, for the past 4-5 days, I have been getting the Black Screen whenever I click on the Chest Icon(Store). 
If I go in to my Champions section on my profile, and select a champion I haven't purchased - it comes up with a greyed out 'Unavailable' button, and it shows no prices in IP, or RP.

I have contacted technical support, and they've given me instructions on what to do and none of it has worked so far. Upon a whole heap of different things they asked me to do, they asked me to check the Direct-X Diagnostic section and follow the instructions given. It states I have to hold the Windows icon and press R, which brings up a little window in which they've asked me to type in 'crnd' and it says that the code(or whatever you call it) couldn't be found.
In saying that, I'm going to assume that's my issue. So can anyone help me out by telling me what I need to do/download, or whatever so that I have that file.

Ps: Around a week or so ago I had to contact Dell (my laptop is Dell). And there was an issue, so they manually updated my drivers for me. And I'm thinking that is my issue.
So if there's anyone that knows what the issues may be, or if I need to provide more information for you to understand furthermore, can you please let me know.

Thanks for your time,

WadeG28

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried everything on [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-) regarding store issues?

Also they asked you to run **cmd** (C M D, not rn as you've attempted according to your OP.)
